rules_text:
Exalted [i](Whenever a creature you control attacks alone, that creature gets +1/+1 until end of turn.)[/i]
[i]Finale –[/i] Whenever Overeager Audience or another enchantment is put into your graveyard from the battlefield, target creature gets +1/+1 until end of turn.
flavor_text: [i]The conductor requested no applause between movements.[/i]
notes: Check trigger frequency, maybe swap out first strike?
